attributes.action: Make video sharing sites ban all explicit content and videos aimed at children
attributes.additional_details: Why should parents be scared for what their children might watch on well known sites after putting an age restriction on. The sites themselves need to make it possible that when we put an age resstriction on that nothing will come up at all.
attributes.background: All I am seeing on the internet is how videos are popping up on devices that have already been set to child friendly. Kids have lost lives and are scared. This needs to stop before it's too late.
